ElementType.name: subview
ElementType.description: Provide ViewController support functionality for the nested content (typically a JSP dynamic include) of this component.

AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: Value binding expression used to bind this component instance to a backing bean property.

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Component identifier of this component. If specified, this identifier must be unique within the context of the closest parent UIComponent that is a NamingContainer.

AttributeType.name: rendered
AttributeType.description: Flag indicating whether this component should be rendered. Default value is true.

ElementType.name: token
ElementType.description: Render a hidden input field whose value is the transaction token for the containing form.

AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: Value binding expression used to bind this component instance to a backing bean property.

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Component identifier of this component. If specified, this identifier must be unique within the context of the closest parent UIComponent that is a NamingContainer.

AttributeType.name: rendered
AttributeType.description: Flag indicating whether this component should be rendered. Default value is true.

AttributeType.name: type
AttributeType.description: The type of validator associated with this tag

AttributeType.name: minlength
AttributeType.description: The minimum valid length of the field

AttributeType.name: maxlength
AttributeType.description: The maximum valid length of the field

AttributeType.name: mask
AttributeType.description: A regular expression to which the value must conform

AttributeType.name: datePatternStrict
AttributeType.description: A date pattern using syntax defined in java.text.SimpleDateFormat

AttributeType.name: message
AttributeType.description: A message displayed when validation fails

AttributeType.name: arg
AttributeType.description: A value that's plugged into the message

AttributeType.name: client
AttributeType.description: If true, validation is performed on the client

AttributeType.name: server
AttributeType.description: If true, validation is performed on the server

AttributeType.name: functionName
AttributeType.description: The name of the function to generate.
